content.user_title: Apply consistent sentence case to UI text
content.value_statement: Inconsistent capitalization in UI text creates confusion and reduces accessibility. This skill provides clear rules for sentence case usage in WooCommerce copy, ensuring user-facing text is readable, modern, and accessible across all languages.
actual_capabilities: Apply sentence case to UI labels, buttons, headings, and messages
Format acronyms correctly in user-facing text
Ensure consistency with existing WooCommerce patterns
limitations: Does not validate text against accessibility guidelines beyond capitalization
Does not translate or localize text
Does not generate new copy content

use_cases.title: Write consistent WooCommerce UI
use_cases.description: Ensure plugin UI text follows WooCommerce sentence case standards for consistent user experience.

use_cases.title: Review UI text formatting

use_cases.title: Guide copy generation

prompt_templates.title: Format button text
prompt_templates.prompt: Write sentence case button labels for these actions: save settings, add product, continue checkout, send test email

prompt_templates.title: Format labels
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert these labels to sentence case: Payment Method, Shipping Address, Order Notes, Tax Rate

prompt_templates.title: Handle brand names
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a message mentioning WooPayments, Stripe, PayPal, and WordPress in sentence case format

prompt_templates.title: Review notification
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert this title case notification to sentence case: Settings Saved Successfully, Unable To Connect To Payment Provider

output_examples.input: Write sentence case text for: 'Complete Setup', 'Add New Gateway', 'Configure Payment Settings'
Format these labels: 'Payment Method', 'Shipping Address', 'Order Notes'
Write button labels for: 'SAVE CHANGES', 'ADD PRODUCT', 'VIEW ALL ORDERS'

best_practices: Capitalize only the first word and proper nouns in UI text
Keep sentences short, action-oriented, and conversational
Use consistent patterns across similar UI elements
anti_patterns: Using title case for all words in labels and buttons
Capitalizing every word in error messages and notifications
Ignoring proper noun exceptions for brand names

faq.question: Does this skill work with all AI assistants?
faq.answer: Yes. It provides guidelines compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for writing consistent UI copy.

faq.question: What is the main rule for sentence case?
faq.answer: Capitalize only the first word, proper nouns, and acronyms. All other words use lowercase.

faq.question: Can I use this for non-WooCommerce projects?
faq.answer: Yes. The sentence case principles apply to any UI text regardless of the platform or framework.

faq.question: Does this skill access any user data?
faq.answer: No. This skill contains only static guidelines and does not read, write, or transmit any data.

faq.question: What exceptions exist for sentence case?
faq.answer: Always capitalize proper nouns, acronyms, and official brand names like PayPal, Stripe, and WooCommerce.

faq.question: How is this different from title case?
faq.answer: Sentence case capitalizes only the first word while title case capitalizes most words. Sentence case is more accessible.
